metadata.title: Satellite Data : NOAA
metadata.description: Satellite imagery from 1991 to present (and continuing). Some historical (pre-1991) data exist.
keywords: North Inner Coast (QCS, Hecate, Dixon Inlet and passages)
South Inner Coast (Johnstone, Georgia, JDF, inlets and passages)
Northeast Pacific and Gulf of Alaska
metadata.notes:

Supplemental Information: Custom software is available for use with this dataset.
